name: Sarwar
text: Ta. Sin. Mim.

name: Sarwar
text: These are the verses of the illustrious Book.

name: Sarwar
text: You will perhaps kill yourself with anguish because they are not accepting the faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Had We wanted, We would have sent them a miracle from the sky to make their heads hang down in submission.

name: Sarwar
text: Whenever a new message comes to them from the Beneficent God, they turn away from it.

name: Sarwar
text: They have called (our revelation) lies. They will soon learn the consequences of what they mocked.

name: Sarwar
text: Have they not seen the earth in which We have made gracious plants grow?

name: Sarwar
text: In this there is, certainly, evidence (of the Truth). But most of them have no faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is the Majestic and the All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: When Your Lord told Moses to go to the unjust people of the Pharaoh

name: Sarwar
text: and ask them, "Why do you not fear God?"

name: Sarwar
text: He replied, "Lord, I am afraid that they will call me a liar.

name: Sarwar
text: I feel nervous and my tongue is not fluent, so send Aaron with me.

name: Sarwar
text: They have charged me [with a crime] for which I am afraid they will kill me."

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord said, "Have no fear, both of you go with Our miracles. We shall closely listen to you."

name: Sarwar
text: They came to the Pharaoh and said, "We are the Messengerss of the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: Send the Israelites with us".

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh said, "Did we not bring you up in our home as an infant and did you not live with us for many years

name: Sarwar
text: and you did the deed which you did. You are certainly ungrateful."

name: Sarwar
text: Moses said, "I did do it and I made a mistake.

name: Sarwar
text: Then I ran away from you in fear, but my Lord granted me the law and has appointed me as a Messenger.

name: Sarwar
text: And this is the favor with which you oblige me: You have made the Israelites your slaves.

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh asked, "Who is the Lord of the Universe?"

name: Sarwar
text: Moses replied, "The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, if you want to be certain".

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh said to the people around him, "Did you hear that?"

name: Sarwar
text: Moses continued, "He is the Lord and the Lord of your forefathers."

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh said, "The Messengers who has been sent to you is certainly insane".

name: Sarwar
text: Moses continued, "He is the Lord of the East and West and all that is between them, if only you would think".

name: Sarwar
text: Pharaoh said, "If you put forward any god other than me, I will surely put you in prison".

name: Sarwar
text: Moses asked, "What if I were to bring you clear proof (of the existence of God)?"

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh replied, "Bring it, if you are telling the truth."

name: Sarwar
text: Moses threw his staff and suddenly it became a serpent.

name: Sarwar
text: Then he uncovered his hand and it was sheer white to the onlookers.

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh said to the people around him, "He is certainly a skillful magician.

name: Sarwar
text: He wants to expel you from your land through his magic. What is your opinion?"

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Hold him and his brother off for a while

name: Sarwar
text: and summon every skillful magician from all the cities."

name: Sarwar
text: So all the magicians gathered together

name: Sarwar
text: at the appointed time

name: Sarwar
text: and the people were asked, "Will you all be there so that we may follow the magicians if they become victorious?"

name: Sarwar
text: When the magicians came, they asked the Pharaoh, "Will there be any reward for us if we win?"

name: Sarwar
text: He replied, "You will then be my closest associates".

name: Sarwar
text: (Moses) asked the magicians, "Cast down what you want to".

name: Sarwar
text: So they cast down their ropes and staffs saying, "By the honor of the Pharaoh we shall certainly become the winners".

name: Sarwar
text: Then Moses cast down his staff and suddenly it swallowed up what they had falsely invented.

name: Sarwar
text: The magicians fell down in adoration

name: Sarwar
text: saying, "We believe in the Lord of the Universe

name: Sarwar
text: and the Lord of Moses and Aaron."

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh said, "You believed without my permission? He seems to be your chief who has taught you magic. But you will soon know (the result of what you have done).

name: Sarwar
text: I shall certainly cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides and crucify you all together."

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "It does not matter. We shall be returning to our Lord.

name: Sarwar
text: We hope that our Lord will forgive us for our sins; we were not believers at first."

name: Sarwar
text: We sent a revelation to Moses telling him to leave with our servants during the night; they would be pursued (by the Pharaoh).

name: Sarwar
text: The Pharaoh sent word to all the cities saying,

name: Sarwar
text: "There is a small group of people

name: Sarwar
text: who have enraged us greatly.

name: Sarwar
text: We are warning all of you about them."

name: Sarwar
text: We deprived them (the unbelievers) of gardens, springs,

name: Sarwar
text: treasures, and graceful dwellings.

name: Sarwar
text: Thus we let the Israelites inherit them all.

name: Sarwar
text: The people of the Pharaoh pursued them at sunrise.

name: Sarwar
text: When the two groups came close to each other, the companions of Moses said, "We will be caught".

name: Sarwar
text: Moses said, "Certainly not. My Lord is with me and He will certainly guide me."

name: Sarwar
text: We sent a revelation to Moses saying, "Strike the sea with your staff." The sea was rent asunder and each side stood high up like a huge mountain.

name: Sarwar
text: Then We brought the two parties closer.

name: Sarwar
text: We saved Moses and all the people with him

name: Sarwar
text: and drowned the other party.

name: Sarwar
text: In this there was certainly evidence (of the Truth), but most of them did not have any faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is certainly Majestic and All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: Tell them the story of Abraham,

name: Sarwar
text: when he asked his father and others, "What do you worship?"

name: Sarwar
text: They replied, "We worship idols and shall continue to worship them".

name: Sarwar
text: He asked them, "Can the idols hear you when you pray to them

name: Sarwar
text: or can they benefit or harm you?"

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "No, but our fathers worshipped them."

name: Sarwar
text: (Abraham) said, "Do you know that what you worship and what your grandfathers worshipped

name: Sarwar
text: are my enemies? Not so the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: He created me and He will guide me.

name: Sarwar
text: It is He who gives me food and drink

name: Sarwar
text: and heals me when I am sick.

name: Sarwar
text: He will cause me to die and will bring me back to life.

name: Sarwar
text: It is He whom I expect to forgive my sins on the Day of Judgment.

name: Sarwar
text: Lord, grant me authority. Join me to the righteous ones.

name: Sarwar
text: Make my words come true in the future.

name: Sarwar
text: Make me inherit the bountiful Paradise.

name: Sarwar
text: Forgive my father. He has gone astray.

name: Sarwar
text: Do not betray me

name: Sarwar
text: on the Day of Judgment when neither wealth nor children will be of any benefit

name: Sarwar
text: except what is done in obedience to God with a submissive heart.

name: Sarwar
text: On the Day of Judgment Paradise will be brought near

name: Sarwar
text: the pious and hell will be left open for the rebellious ones

name: Sarwar
text: who will be asked, "What did you worship

name: Sarwar
text: besides God? Will the idols help you? Can they help themselves?"

name: Sarwar
text: The idol worshippers, the idols, the rebellious ones,

name: Sarwar
text: and the army of satan will all be thrown headlong into hell.

name: Sarwar
text: "Quarrelling therein with each other,

name: Sarwar
text: they will say, "By God, we were in clear error

name: Sarwar
text: when we considered you equal to the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: Only the sinful ones made us go astray.

name: Sarwar
text: We have no one to intercede for us before God

name: Sarwar
text: nor a loving friend.

name: Sarwar
text: Would that we could have a chance to live again so that we might become believers."

name: Sarwar
text: In this there is evidence (of the truth), but many of them do not have any faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is certainly Majestic and All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: The people of Noah rejected the Messengerss.

name: Sarwar
text: span class="col">Their brother Noah asked them, "Why do you not fear God?

name: Sarwar
text: I am a trustworthy Messengers sent to you.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and obey me.

name: Sarwar
text: I ask no payment from you for my preaching. The Lord of the Universe will give me my reward.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and obey me."

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Should we believe in you when no one has followed you except the lowest ones".

name: Sarwar
text: (Noah) said, "I have no knowledge of their deeds.

name: Sarwar
text: If only you would realize, their account is with my Lord.

name: Sarwar
text: I do not drive away the believers.

name: Sarwar
text: I am only a Prophet.

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Noah, if you do not desist, you will, certainly, be stoned to death."

name: Sarwar
text: Then Noah said, "Lord, my people have rejected me.

name: Sarwar
text: Judge among us and save me and the believers with me".

name: Sarwar
text: We saved him and those who were with him in a fully laden Ark,

name: Sarwar
text: and drowned the others.

name: Sarwar
text: In this there is evidence (of the truth) but most of them do not have any faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is Majestic and All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: The tribe of Ad rejected the Messengers.

name: Sarwar
text: Their brother Hud asked them, "Why do you not have fear of God?

name: Sarwar
text: I am a trustworthy Messengers sent to you.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and obey me.

name: Sarwar
text: I do not ask for any payment for my preaching. I shall receive my reward from the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: "Do you build useless monuments on every mountain

name: Sarwar
text: and raise strong mansions as if you were to live forever?

name: Sarwar
text: When you attack, you attack as tyrants do.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and obey me.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of the One who has bestowed upon you all that you know.

name: Sarwar
text: He has given you cattle, children,

name: Sarwar
text: gardens, and springs.

name: Sarwar
text: I am afraid that you will suffer the torment of the Day of Judgment."

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Whether you preach to us or not,

name: Sarwar
text: your preaching is nothing but ancient legends and we shall not face any torment".

name: Sarwar
text: They rejected him and We destroyed them.

name: Sarwar
text: In this there is evidence (of the Truth), yet most of them do not have any faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is Majestic and All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: The tribe of Thamud rejected the Messengers.

name: Sarwar
text: Their brother Salih asked them, "Why do you not fear God?

name: Sarwar
text: I am a trustworthy Messengers sent to you.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and obey me.

name: Sarwar
text: I do not ask for any payment for my preaching. I shall receive my reward from the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: "Do you think that you will remain here peacefully forever

name: Sarwar
text: amidst the gardens, springs,

name: Sarwar
text: farms, and palm-trees in thick groves,

name: Sarwar
text: carving comfortable houses out of the mountains?

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and obey me.

name: Sarwar
text: Do not obey the orders of the transgressors

name: Sarwar
text: who spread evil in the land with no reform."

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "You are only bewitched and insane.

name: Sarwar
text: You are a mere mortal like us. Show us a miracle if you are telling the Truth".

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "This is a she-camel. She will have her share of water as you have your share, each on a certain day.

name: Sarwar
text: Do not cause her to suffer lest you become subject to the torment of the great day (of Judgment)."

name: Sarwar
text: They slew the she-camel, but later became regretful

name: Sarwar
text: and torment struck them. In this there is evidence of the Truth, yet many people do not have any faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is Majestic and All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: The people of Lot rejected the Messengers.

name: Sarwar
text: Their brother Lot asked them, "Why do you not have fear of God?

name: Sarwar
text: I am a trustworthy Messengers.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and obey me.

name: Sarwar
text: I do not ask any payment for my preaching. I shall receive my reward from the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: Do you, in the world, want to have carnal relations with males

name: Sarwar
text: instead of your wives, whom your Lord has created specially for you? You are a transgressing people."

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Lot, if you do not give up preaching, you will certainly be expelled (from this town)".

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "I certainly hate what you practice.

name: Sarwar
text: Lord, save me and my family from their deeds."

name: Sarwar
text: We saved him and all of his family

name: Sarwar
text: except an old woman who remained behind.

name: Sarwar
text: We destroyed the others

name: Sarwar
text: by pouring upon them a terrible shower of rain. How evil was the rain for those who had been warned!

name: Sarwar
text: In this there is an evidence of the Truth, but many of them did not have any faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is Majestic and All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: The dwellers of the forest also rejected the Messengers.

name: Sarwar
text: Shu'ayb asked them, "Why do you not have fear of God?

name: Sarwar
text: I am a trustworthy Messengers.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and obey me.

name: Sarwar
text: I do not ask any payment for my preaching. I shall receive my reward from the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: "Maintain just measure in your business and do not cause loss to others.

name: Sarwar
text: Weigh your goods with proper balance

name: Sarwar
text: and do not defraud people in their property or spread evil in the land.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of the One who has created you and the generations that lived before you."

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "You are no more than a bewitched and insane man

name: Sarwar
text: and a mere mortal like us. We think you are a liar.

name: Sarwar
text: Let a part of the sky fall on us if what you say is true".

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "My Lord knows all that you do."

name: Sarwar
text: They rejected him and then the torment of the gloomy day struck them. It was certainly a great torment.

name: Sarwar
text: In this there is an evidence of the Truth, but many of them did not have any faith.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is Majestic and All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: This, (Quran), is certainly the revelation from the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: It has been revealed through the trustworthy Spirit

name: Sarwar
text: to your heart, so that you will warn (the people of the dangers of disobeying God).

name: Sarwar
text: It has been revealed in plain Arabic.

name: Sarwar
text: Its news was also mentioned in the ancient Books.

name: Sarwar
text: Is not the fact (that the Israelite scholars already knew about the Quran through their Book) sufficient evidence for the pagans of the truthfulness (of the Quran)?

name: Sarwar
text: Had We revealed it to a non-Arab

name: Sarwar
text: who would have read it to them, they (pagans) would not have believed in it.

name: Sarwar
text: Thus it passes through the hearts of the criminals.

name: Sarwar
text: They will not believe in it until they suffer the painful torment.

name: Sarwar
text: The torment will strike them suddenly without their knowledge.

name: Sarwar
text: They will say, "Can we be granted any respite?"

name: Sarwar
text: Do they want to hasten Our torment?

name: Sarwar
text: Do you not see that even if We give them respite for years

name: Sarwar
text: and then Our torment will strike them,

name: Sarwar
text: none of their luxuries will be able to save them from the torment?

name: Sarwar
text: We never destroyed any town without first sending to them warning and guidance.

name: Sarwar
text: We have never been unjust to anyone.

name: Sarwar
text: The satans have not revealed the Quran;

name: Sarwar
text: they are not supposed to do so. Nor do have they the ability for such a task.

name: Sarwar
text: The satans are barred from listening to anything from the heavens.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), do not worship anything besides God lest you suffer the punishment.

name: Sarwar
text: Warn your close relatives

name: Sarwar
text: and be kind to your believing followers.

name: Sarwar
text: If they disobey you, tell them, "I condemn your disobedient deeds".

name: Sarwar
text: Have trust in the Majestic and All-merciful God,

name: Sarwar
text: who can see whether you stand up

name: Sarwar
text: or move during your prostration with the worshippers.

name: Sarwar
text: He is All-hearing and All-knowing."

name: Sarwar
text: Should I tell you to whom the satans come?

name: Sarwar
text: They come to every sinful liar.

name: Sarwar
text: The satans try to listen to the heavens but many of them are liars.

name: Sarwar
text: Only the erring people follow the poets.

name: Sarwar
text: Have you not seen them wandering and bewildered in every valley

name: Sarwar
text: and preaching what they themselves never practice.

name: Sarwar
text: The righteously striving believers among them who remember God very often and use their talent to seek help after they have been wronged are the exceptional. The unjust will soon know how terrible their end will be.
